page.title: 04A Day In The Life Of Stephen
page.content: My mum gets up at 7.30 am to read the paper and to feed Tiger our cat.At 8.00 she gets me and my sister Julie up.We get dressed and go down stairs for breakfast.I usually have a boiled egg and some coffee.My sister has some toast and some milk.My mum has Weetabix and some tea or coffee. At 8.30 my sister's friends come for her.Their names are Lisa and Elaine.I run round to Neil Allen's.We walk up to school. At 9.00 the bell rings. Then we go into assembley.After that it is Maths, then English,then it is lunch. At 10.45 my mum walks up to school because she works here as a dinner lady. At 3.45 we go home. Today, at 10.00 pm, my dad goes to work.He is an engine driver and his engine pulls coal waggons.
